name: The First Wave
description:
Probe intercepted. Contents: a gold disc. Revealed: a planet in a distant galaxy. Your mission is to reach it. You are the first wave.

Known Issues

  • The game crashes if you touch the sliders before you've finished recruiting. If you wait until you've finished hiring 4 members it'll be ok.
  • The game crashes if you set any slider all the way up to the max position. Just make sure you don't go 100% and it'll be ok. Sorry!
  • The game doesn't load if you have adblockers or popup blockers on

Gameplay

  • Hire a crew with unique perks and flaws
  • Choose 1 of 3 constellations as your route to Earth
  • Stop by different planets on your way - some are barren rocks, others are teeming with wildlife.
  • On planets with sentient life, develop and execute plans of action as a means to get what you need.
  • Fight enemy spaceships, and master combat that involves three elements - each with their own strengths and weaknesses.
  • Upgrade your crew and ship with research to build toward a specific playstyle.
  • Mine metals from asteroids and hunt animals to collect biomass.
  • Reach 1 of 5 endings on Earth

In-game, check the left screen for a more in-depth description of how to play!

Controls

  • WAD - Turn
  • Right Mouse Button - Zoom
  • H - Help / Pause
